headline: The media sector faces a 'great shedding' of assets before M&A revival: Starz CEO
summary: Media consolidation is on hold as companies focus first on shedding non-core assets before pursuing mergers, Starz CEO Jeff Hirsch said.

headline: Disney, Microsoft Announce Massive Layoffs
summary: Walt Disney Co. is laying off several hundred employees across its film and TV businesses, affecting marketing, publicity, casting, development, and corporate financial operations. Microsoft is cutting even more jobs after cutting 6,000 jobs last month. Bloomberg's Caroline Hyde reports.

raw.headline: Disney, Microsoft Announce Massive Layoffs
raw.summary: Walt Disney Co. is laying off several hundred employees across its film and TV businesses, affecting marketing, publicity, casting, development, and corporate financial operations. Microsoft is cutting even more jobs after cutting 6,000 jobs last month. Bloomberg's Caroline Hyde reports.

headline: General Mills gives cereals a makeover with Marvel’s ‘The Fantastic Four’
summary: General Mills (GIS) is bringing Mister Fantastic, Invisible Woman, Human Torch and The Thing to the cereal aisle with a special series of cereal boxes inspired by Disney’s (DIS) Marvel Studios’ “The Fantastic Four: First Steps,” in theaters July 25. A limited run of replica Lucky Charms cereal boxes – resembling those seen in the film – will also be released as part of the collaboration in July. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financial news.
